00014 class Plugins_Wordpress_Publish extends Common_Publish
00015 {
00016     protected $_auth;
00017     protected $_account;
00018 
00019     protected $_client;
00020 
00021     /**
00022      * @return void
00023      */
00024     function __construct()
00025     {
00026         parent::__construct();
00027     }
00028 
00029     /**
00030      * Metodo para conectarse a una identidad wordpress
00031      * @param obj $auth
00032      * @return void
00033      */
00034     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00035      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Publish#connect($token)
00036      */
00037     public function connect($auth)
00038     {
00039         $this->_auth = json_decode($auth);
00040 
00041         $user = Auth::get_instance();
00042 
00043         $this->_ci->load->library('encrypt');
00044         $this->_auth->password = $this->_ci->encrypt->decode($this->_auth->password, sha1($user->getEmail()));
00045         $this->_auth->username = $this->_ci->encrypt->decode($this->_auth->username, sha1($user->getEmail()));
00046 
00047         /***
00048          * +Info::
00049          * http://life.mysiteonline.org/archives/161-Automatic-Post-Creation-with-Wordpress,-PHP,-and-XML-RPC.html
00050          */
00051         $this->_client = new IXR_Client(prep_url($this->_auth->url).'/xmlrpc.php');
00052     }
00053     
00054     /**
00055      * Método que valida si el contenido a publicar es correcto.
00056      *
00057      * @param array $post
00058      * @param User_Accounts_Data $targetAccount
00059      * @return Message_Data
00060      */
00061     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00062      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Publish#validatePost($post, $targetAccount)
00063      */
00064     public function validatePost($post = null, User_Accounts_Data $targetAccount)
00065     {
00066         $this->_ci->lang->load("errormessages");
00067         $msg = new Message_Data();
00068         $data = array();
00069 
00070         if (is_null($post)) {
00071 
00072             $msg->setError("form", $this->_ci->lang->line("unknownError"));
00073             return $msg;
00074         }
00075 
00076         if (isset($post["wp_content"]) and $post["wp_content"] != "") {
00077 
00078             $post["wp_content"] = preg_replace('/src="([^"]+)"/i', ' src="'.base_url()."\\1".'" ', $post["wp_content"]);
00079             $data["text"] = $post["wp_content"];
00080 
00081         } else {
00082 
00083             $msg->setError("wp_content", $this->_ci->lang->line("requiredField"));        }
00084 
00085         $data["category"] = $post["wp_categories"];
00086         $data["tags"] = $post["tags"];
00087         $data["text"] = $post["wp_content"];
00088 
00089         $msg->setTitle($post["wp_titular"]);
00090         $msg->setData($data);
00091 
00092         return $msg;
00093     }
00094 
00095     /**
00096      * Método para publicar contenido en una cuenta wordpress
00097      * @param Array $post
00098      * @return Message_Data
00099      */
00100     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00101      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Publish#publish($post, $targetAccount)
00102      */
00103     function publish($post = null, User_Accounts_Data $targetAccount)
00104     {
00105         $this->_account = $targetAccount;
00106 
00107         $auth = Auth::get_instance();
00108         $msg = $this->validatePost($post, $targetAccount);
00109 
00110         $msg->setIdU($auth->getUserId());
00111         $msg->setOwner("1");
00112 
00113         if($msg->isValid()) {
00114             
00115             $this->connect($this->_account->getAuth());
00116 
00117             $content = $msg->getData("text");
00118             preg_match_all('/src="([^"]+)"/i',$content, $imgMatches);
00119             $imgMatches = $imgMatches[1];
00120 
00121             $media = array();
00122 
00123             foreach ($imgMatches as $img) {
00124 
00125                 $img = str_replace(base_url()."tmp/", FCPATH.'tmp/' ,$img);
00126 
00127                 if( file_exists($img) ) {
00128 
00129                     $name = substr($img, strrpos($img, DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR)+1 );
00130                     $mime = mime_content_type($img);
00131 
00132                     $media[] = array(
00133                         "name" => $name,
00134                         "type" => $mime,
00135                         "bits" => new IXR_Base64(file_get_contents($img))
00136                     );
00137 
00138                     unlink($img);
00139                 }
00140             }
00141 
00142             foreach($media as $item) {
00143             
00144                 if ( $this->_client->query('metaWeblog.newMediaObject',
00145                     '', $this->_auth->username, $this->_auth->password, $item) ) {
00146 
00147                     $newUrl = $this->_auth->url."wp-content/uploads/".date("Y/m/");
00148                     $content = str_replace(base_url()."tmp/", $newUrl , $content);
00149                 }
00150             }
00151 
00152             $data = $msg->getData();
00153             $data["text"] = $content;
00154             $msg->setData($data);
00155 
00156             $content = array();
00157             $content['title'] = $msg->getTitle();
00158             $content['categories'] = $msg->getData("category");
00159             $content['description'] = $msg->getData("text");
00160             $content['mt_keywords'] = $msg->getData("tags");
00161 
00162             if (!$this->_client->query('metaWeblog.newPost','', $this->_auth->username,$this->_auth->password, $content, true)) {
00163 
00164                 Throw new Exception('An error occurred on wordpress publishing - '.$this->_client->getErrorMessage());
00165             }
00166 
00167             $msg->setRemoteId($this->_client->getResponse()); //Will report the ID of the new post
00168 
00169             if ($msg->isValid()) {
00170 
00171                 return $this->fetch($msg->getRemoteId());
00172             }
00173         }
00174 
00175         return $msg;
00176     }
00177     
00178     /**
00179      * @param integer $id
00180      * @return Message_Data
00181      */
00182     private function fetch($id)
00183     {
00184         if ($this->_client->query(
00185             'metaWeblog.getPost',
00186             $id,
00187             $this->_auth->username,
00188             $this->_auth->password,
00189             array("post_id" => $id)
00190         )) {
00191 
00192             $post = $this->_client->getResponse();
00193         }
00194 
00195         if ($this->_client->query(
00196             'wp.getComments',
00197             '',
00198             $this->_auth->username,
00199             $this->_auth->password,
00200             array("post_id" => $id)
00201         )) {
00202 
00203             $post["comments"] = count($this->_client->getResponse());
00204         }
00205 
00206         return Plugins_Wordpress_DB::save($post, $this->_account->getIdU());
00207     }
00208

00210      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Publish#reference($message, $account)
00211      */
00212     public function reference(Message_Data $message, User_Accounts_Data $account)
00213     {
00214         return false;
00215     }
00216 }
